SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes

Class CommonTableView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes.CommonTableView
public class CommonTableView extends Object
Implementation of the Common Table for the GUI. The Common Table is the portion of UI that contains the following elements: - The ScoreBoard - The Resource Deck - The Gold Deck - The two Resource Slots - The two Gold Decks This class contains all the GUI elements and their behavior.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonTableView

      public CommonTableView(NetworkController controller, GUIController guiController, DeckView resourceDeck, DeckView goldDeck, javafx.scene.image.ImageView resourceDown1, javafx.scene.image.ImageView resourceDown2, javafx.scene.image.ImageView goldDown1, javafx.scene.image.ImageView goldDown2, javafx.scene.image.ImageView commonObjective1, javafx.scene.image.ImageView commonObjective2, javafx.scene.text.Text objName1, javafx.scene.text.Text objDescr1, javafx.scene.text.Text objName2, javafx.scene.text.Text objDescr2, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane commonObjDescriptionBox1, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane commonObjDescriptionBox2) throws RemoteException
      Constructor Method.
      Parameters:
      controller - : The NetworkController that will be used to send Messages.
      guiController - : The GUIController that created this CommonTable.
      resourceDeck - : The DeckView that contains the Resource Deck.
      goldDeck - : The DeckView that contains the Gold Deck.
      resourceDown1 - : The ImageView that contains the Resource Card Slot 1.
      resourceDown2 - : The ImageView that contains the Resource Card Slot 2.
      goldDown1 - : The ImageView that contains the Gold Card Slot 1.
      goldDown2 - : The ImageView that contains the Gold Card Slot 2.
      commonObjective1 - : The ImageView that contains the Common Objective 1.
      commonObjective2 - : The ImageView that contains the Common Objective 2.
      objName1 - : The Text containing Common Objective 1's name.
      objDescr1 - : The Text containing Common Objective 1's description.
      objName2 - : The Text containing Common Objective 2's name.
      objDescr2 - : The Text containing Common Objective 2's description.
      commonObjDescriptionBox1 - : the StackPane containing Common Objective 1's Name and Description.
      commonObjDescriptionBox2 - : the StackPane containing Common Objective 2's Name and Description.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of communication errors.

  • Method Details

    • select

      public void select(int number)
      Handles what happens when the User navigates on any of the Cards or Decks with their keyboard. The Selected element is highlighted with a yellow glow.
      Parameters:
      number - : an ID indicating which element has been selected.

    • deselect

      public void deselect(int number)
      Handles what happens when the user's focus leaves an element. The Selected yellow glow effect is removed from the element.
      Parameters:
      number - : an ID indicating which element is deselected.

    • onArrowKeyPressed

      public void onArrowKeyPressed(String key)
      Handles the Keyboard Arrow Keys Inputs
      Parameters:
      key - : a String containing the name of the Arrow KEY: "UP", "DOWN", "RIGHT", "LEFT".

      Handles the Keyboard Enter Key Pressing.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a communication error.

      public void refreshResourceSlot(int slot)
      Visually updates one of the Resource CardView slots.
      Parameters:
      slot - : an int specifying if it needs to update slot 1 or 2.
